Sentencas: This paper reports a way to utilize low-concentration coal-bed gas(LC-CBG) to generate power using SOFC technology.
Titulo: Utilization of low-concentration coal-bed gas to generate power using a core-shell catalyst-modified solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Ni-BaO-CeO2@SiO2 (@NBC) porous nanoparticles with a core-shell structure were synthesized and applied as a protective layer on an anode consisting of Ni-yttria stabilized zirconia (Ni-YSZ).
Titulo: Utilization of low-concentration coal-bed gas to generate power using a core-shell catalyst-modified solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Catalytic activity of @NBC relative to methane partial oxidation was evaluated.
Titulo: Utilization of low-concentration coal-bed gas to generate power using a core-shell catalyst-modified solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Electrochemical performance and durability of the @NBC-modified cells (@NBC//Ni-YSZ) were tested fed with simulated LC-CBG (30% CH4-70% air).
Titulo: Utilization of low-concentration coal-bed gas to generate power using a core-shell catalyst-modified solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: A conventional cell without a protective layer (Ni-YSZ) and a bare NBC-modified cell (NBC//Ni-YSZ) were used for a comparison.
Titulo: Utilization of low-concentration coal-bed gas to generate power using a core-shell catalyst-modified solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The pre- and post-mortem microstructures of cells were analyzed.
Titulo: Utilization of low-concentration coal-bed gas to generate power using a core-shell catalyst-modified solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Influence of porosity of the anode layer on polarization resistance was also investigated.
Titulo: Utilization of low-concentration coal-bed gas to generate power using a core-shell catalyst-modified solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The loading mode of catalysts was discussed as well.
Titulo: Utilization of low-concentration coal-bed gas to generate power using a core-shell catalyst-modified solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Using simulated LC-CBG as a fuel, peak power density of @NBC//Ni-YSZ showed 50% increase at 800 degrees C comparing with Ni-YSZ at the same conditions.
Titulo: Utilization of low-concentration coal-bed gas to generate power using a core-shell catalyst-modified solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The aging test in galvano-static mode demonstrated good durability of @NBC//Ni-YSZ lasting for over 160 h when exposed to LC-CBG.
Titulo: Utilization of low-concentration coal-bed gas to generate power using a core-shell catalyst-modified solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: For comparison, NBC//Ni-YSZ showed rapid voltage drop after 60 h. Voltage of the Ni-YSZ dropped after 10 h.
Titulo: Utilization of low-concentration coal-bed gas to generate power using a core-shell catalyst-modified solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: No coking was observed on the @NBC//Ni-YSZ anode surface after the durability tests.
Titulo: Utilization of low-concentration coal-bed gas to generate power using a core-shell catalyst-modified solid oxide fuel cell
